MedTherapyStmtReviewIssue.name: MedTherapyStmtReviewIssue
MedTherapyStmtReviewIssue.description: Represents a junction object between the Medication Therapy Statement Review and Clinical Detected Issue objects.

ClinicalDetectedIssueId.description: The clinical detected issue associated with the medication therapy statement review.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

MedicationTherapyStmtReviewId.description: The medication therapy statement review associated with the clinical detected issue.

Name.description: The system-generated name of the medication therapy statement review issue record.

SourceSysModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time when the record was last modified in its source system.

SourceSystem.description: The source system from where the record was brought into Salesforce.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the record in its source system.
